title: Analysis of Factors Influencing Student Engagement in Remote Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic operational proficiency in online learning platforms and understanding of survey methodologies
context.additional_context: Deriving improvements for distance education based on adult learners' actual experiences

learning_goals: Learners can explain three core factors influencing student engagement in remote learning environments
Learners can analyze the impact of learning motivation and values on engagement using statistical data
Learners can propose educational improvement plans in team project formats based on actual survey results
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
